constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 42 (Wednesday, March 9, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BRADY:
H.R. 7014.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
United States Constitution, Article I, Section 8.
[Page H1424]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: To suspend normal trade relations treatment for the Russian Federation and the Republic of Belarus, and for other purposes.
